article_title: 22 killed in Israeli strikes on Beirut, Lebanon says
sentence: Hostilities  in  the  region  have  escalated  steadily  since  Hezbollah  began  firing  rockets  into  northern  Israel  on  8  October  2023,  the  day  after  its  ally  Hamas's  deadly  attack  on  southern  Israel,  which  killed  about  1,200  people.

article_title: 22 killed in Israeli strikes on Beirut, Lebanon says
sentence: Since  7  October,  nearly  42,000  people  have  been  killed  during  Israel's  offensive  in  Gaza,  according  to  the  Hamas-run  health  ministry.
